plugins.name: Badenova Design System Sync
plugins.description:
This plugin synchronizes your Figma tokens with the Badenova Design System


Usage:

You need to provide a valid GitHub token to synchronize your Figma tokens.

To obtain a GitHub token, contact christoph.hummel@badenova.de or generate your own token.


If you have a valid GitHub token, enter it into the respective input field and press Save.

Then, click the Sync Badenova Design-Tokens button.

If the synchronization is successful, you will receive a confirmation message.
plugins.tagline: Synchronize your Figma tokens with the Badenova Design System

plugins.name: Namer | Неймер
plugins.description:
Namer renames selected frames based on their position (top-to-bottom, left-to-right) on the canvas, ignoring layer hierarchy. Adds sequential numbers with your custom prefix: Prefix_1, Prefix_2, etc.


Неймер переименовывает выбранные фреймы по их расположению на рабочей области (сверху-вниз, слева-направо), игнорируя иерархию слоев. Добавляет порядковые номера с вашим префиксом: Префикс_1, Префикс_2 и т.д.


How to Use / Как использовать:

  1. Select frames → Open plugin → Click "Переименовать".
  2. Выберите фреймы → Запустите плагин → Нажмите «Переименовать».
plugins.tagline: Rename frames by position, not layers. / Переименовывает фреймы по расположению, а не слоям.

plugins.name: XenVision
plugins.description:
Simplify your design review workflow by seamlessly exporting Figma designs to Xenvision. This plugin bridges the gap between Figma and Xenvision, enabling quick exports without leaving your workspace.


Key features:

• One-click export to Xenvision

• Maintain design fidelity during transfer

• Streamline your design review process

• Save time on manual exports and uploads


Perfect for teams using Xenvision as their design review platform. Export individual frames or entire pages directly from Figma to kickstart your design feedback process.
plugins.tagline: Export designs directly to Xenvision for streamlined design reviews

plugins.name: Component repeater
plugins.description:
# Component Repeater


A Figma plugin that helps you create components from repeated elements while preserving variations in styles, text, and images.


## What it does


This plugin analyzes your selection and creates a component that intelligently handles:


- Style variations (colors, effects, layout properties)

- Text content variations

- Image variations


When you have multiple similar elements that differ in styles or content, this plugin will:


1. Create a main component with variants for different styles

2. Create a separate component set for image variations

3. Replace all selected elements with instances of the component

4. Preserve the original text content and image placement


## How to use it


1. **Select similar elements**


- Select two or more groups or frames that have the same structure

- The plugin has a feature to help you find all similar elements from one selected node

- The elements can have different styles, text content, or images but should have the same layer structure


2. **Run the plugin**


- The plugin will analyze your selection and show variations in:

- Text content

- Colors and effects

- Images

- Layout properties


3. **Create the component**


- Click "Replace selection with a component"

- The plugin will create:

- A main component with style variants (if variations exist)

- A separate image component set (if images are used)

- Instances that preserve the original variations


4. **Finding similar elements**

- Select a single element

- Click "Find Similar Nodes" to select all elements with the same structure

- Use this to find more elements to include for replacement


## Tips


- The plugin works best with elements that have the same structure (same hierarchy of layers)

- Style variations are automatically detected and turned into variants

- Text content is preserved in each instance

- Images are turned into a swappable component

- Use the resize handle in the bottom right to adjust the plugin window size


## Requirements


- Works with groups and frames

- Selected elements must have the same layer structure

- Supports both direct images and image fills
plugins.tagline: Create components from repeated elements while preserving variations in styles, text, and images

1. **Select similar elements**

2. **Run the plugin**

## Tips

- Style variations are automatically detected and turned into variants

- Text content is preserved in each instance

- Images are turned into a swappable component

- Works with groups and frames

plugins.name: The Ultimate Table
plugins.description:
The Ultimate Table is a powerful Figma plugin that enables you to create reusable, fully customizable tables with draggable rows and columns.


Features

  1. Rearrange, remove, add, or duplicate columns and rows
  2. Drag to adjust column widths in header cells
  3. Automatic row height adjustment based on content
  4. Maintain linked tables across your design


Styling Options

  1. Customizable padding, margins, and borders
  2. Column text alignment controls
  3. Zebra striping support
  4. Header styling with sort/filter/search indicators
  5. Custom border radius
  6. Flexible font and size options


Smart Updates

  1. Master table controls for consistent styling


Need a quick start?

  1. Learn all there is to know in less than 10 minutes in this video tutorial
  2. Complete tutorial (Written & Video) at ultimate-table.com
plugins.tagline: Finally a plugin to create reusable, fully customizable tables with draggable rows and columns.

plugins.name: Components to Section
plugins.description:
Easily regroup all your master components into a section. Runs across all pages of your file

Plugin does not have UI to run.


How to use

Launch via cmd + / or go to plugin > Component to Section

Tab and choose

  1. Run on current page
  2. Run on all pages
  3. Set preferences


Preferences (User saved)

  1. Choose where to create the section (current page or new page)
  2. Choose the spacing between regrouped components


Why paid?

I'm a hobbyist and it's very difficult to write clean efficient code.

I have a day job and it's a good way to keep me motivated and work extra hours.

$2 is the cheapest a plugin can be sold on figma, I was happy with $0.99 but hey...


If this plugin starts selling regularly I will keep adding commands to make it even more powerful


Free stuff

If you are looking for free stuff, I have published two widget and they are currently used by more than 50K users


Help out ?

I'm in the London, UK and always keen to hear about fellow hackers, If you want to contribute to the plugin or have a suggestion feel free to contact me on edwardbattistini.com/contact

accepted.name: EdwardB
accepted.description: Product designer during the day. Super dad at night

plugins.tagline: Regroup all your master components to a section

plugins.name: json数据转设计稿 json to Frame
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin allows users to quickly create Figma elements by inputting JSON data, improving workflow efficiency.


Function Description

  1. Generate Figma elements through JSON input
  2. Multi-language user interface support
  3. Compatible with multi-layered frame structures
  4. Can be used together with the plugin Export Frame JSON Pro for seamless frame export and import.


How to Use

  1. Open the plugin interface and select the appropriate language.
  2. Enter or paste valid JSON data into the JSON input field.
  3. Click the “Submit JSON” button, and the plugin will generate corresponding Figma elements based on the input data.


Important Notes

  1. Ensure the JSON data is correctly formatted, or elements may not be generated properly.
  2. This plugin can be used together with Export Frame JSON Pro for quick frame import and export.


介绍

本插件允许用户通过输入 JSON 数据，快速生成 Figma 画板中的元素，提升设计工作效率。


功能说明

  1. 通过 JSON 输入生成 Figma 元素
  2. 支持多种语言的用户界面
  3. 兼容画板的多层次结构
  4. 支持与【画板 JSON 导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro】插件配合使用，轻松实现画板导出与导入的无缝对接。


使用方法

  1. 打开插件界面，选择适合的语言。
  2. 在 JSON 输入框中输入或粘贴有效的 JSON 数据。
  3. 点击“提交 JSON”按钮，插件将根据输入的数据生成对应的 Figma 元素。


注意事项

  1. 确保输入的 JSON 数据格式正确，否则可能无法生成元素。
  2. 该插件支持与【画板 JSON 导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro】插件一起使用，实现画板的快速导入导出。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Easily create Figma frames from JSON data input.

plugins.name: 一键翻译元素 Quick Translate
plugins.description:
Introduction

Quick Translate is a Figma plugin designed to help you instantly translate selected text elements into different languages with just one click. Save time and improve your workflow by translating text directly within your design files.


Function Description

  1. Translate selected text elements into a specified target language.
  2. Supports multiple languages and automatic translation of all text layers in a Figma selection.
  3. Easy-to-use interface to select languages and apply translations quickly.
  4. Ideal for designers working on multilingual projects or collaborating with global teams.


How to Use

  1. Select one or more text elements in your Figma file.
  2. Open the plugin from the "Plugins" menu.
  3. Choose the target language for translation.
  4. Click the "Translate" button, and the selected text will be replaced with the translated version.


Notes

  1. Ensure your Figma selection includes text elements, as the plugin only works with text layers.
  2. The translation may vary depending on the accuracy of the API and the language selected.
  3. For optimal results, select only relevant text elements to avoid unnecessary API calls.


介绍

Quick Translate 是一款 Figma 插件，旨在帮助您一键翻译选中的文本元素。通过该插件，您可以直接在 Figma 文件中将文本翻译为不同语言，节省时间，提高工作效率。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的文本元素翻译为指定的目标语言。
  2. 支持多种语言，并自动翻译 Figma 选择中的所有文本图层。
  3. 提供简单易用的界面，可以快速选择语言并应用翻译。
  4. 适用于多语言项目的设计师，或者与全球团队协作的设计师。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 文件中选择一个或多个文本元素。
  2. 从“插件”菜单打开插件。
  3. 选择目标翻译语言。
  4. 点击“翻译”按钮，选中的文本将被翻译并替换。


注意事项

  1. 请确保您的 Figma 选择包含文本元素，因为插件只支持文本图层。
  2. 翻译效果可能会根据 API 的准确性和所选语言有所不同。
  3. 为了获得最佳效果，建议只选择相关的文本元素，以避免不必要的 API 请求。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Quick Translate: Instant Translation for Figma Elements

plugins.name: 路径文字 Path Text Aligner
plugins.description:
Introduction

Path Text Aligner is a Figma plugin that allows users to easily align text along any custom path, providing more flexibility and control over text placement in your design.


Function Description

  1. Aligns selected text to any vector path or shape.
  2. Adjusts text along curves, straight lines, and complex paths.
  3. Offers controls for offset and spacing to fine-tune text positioning.
  4. Supports multi-line text alignment along a path.


How to Use

  1. Select the text you want to align.
  2. Draw or select the path you want the text to follow.
  3. Run the plugin, and the text will automatically align to the path.
  4. Adjust settings for text spacing, direction, and offset to achieve the desired effect.


Notes

  1. This plugin works best with vector paths (e.g., lines or shapes).
  2. Ensure the text layer is not grouped with other objects for proper alignment.
  3. You may need to adjust font size or path curvature for optimal results.


介绍

路径文字（Path Text Aligner）是一个Figma插件，允许用户轻松地将文字沿自定义路径对齐，在设计中提供更多的灵活性和控制。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的文字沿任意矢量路径或形状对齐。
  2. 支持文本在曲线、直线及复杂路径上的对齐。
  3. 提供偏移和间距控制，以微调文本的位置。
  4. 支持沿路径对齐多行文本。


使用方法

  1. 选择要对齐的文字。
  2. 绘制或选择要让文字跟随的路径。
  3. 启动插件，文字将自动沿路径对齐。
  4. 调整文本间距、方向和偏移设置，以获得理想效果。


注意事项

  1. 此插件适用于矢量路径（例如，线条或形状）。
  2. 请确保文字图层未与其他对象组合，以确保正确对齐。
  3. 根据路径曲率和字体大小调整设置，以获得最佳效果。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Align text along any path with ease in Figma.

136426.name: 路径文字 Path Text Aligner

使用方法

  1. 选择要对齐的文字。
  2. 绘制或选择要让文字跟随的路径。
  3. 启动插件，文字将自动沿路径对齐。
  4. 调整文本间距、方向和偏移设置，以获得理想效果。


注意事项

  1. 此插件适用于矢量路径（例如，线条或形状）。
  2. 请确保文字图层未与其他对象组合，以确保正确对齐。
  3. 根据路径曲率和字体大小调整设置，以获得最佳效果。

plugins.name: 画板自动编号 Auto Artboard Numbering
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin automates the numbering of selected Figma artboards, allowing you to customize the naming sequence with prefixes and suffixes. It supports multiple languages, enhancing your workflow efficiency and organization.


Function Introduction

  1. Automatically numbers selected artboards in Figma.
  2. Customizable naming with prefixes and suffixes.
  3. Supports multiple languages.
  4. Two naming sequences: left-to-right then top-to-bottom, or top-to-bottom then left-to-right.


How to Use

  1. Select the artboards you want to rename.
  2. Choose your preferred naming sequence.
  3. Optionally, add a prefix or suffix.
  4. Click "Apply Naming" to rename the selected artboards.


Notes

  1. Ensure artboards are selected before applying the naming operation.
  2. The plugin temporarily disables the apply button for 2 seconds to prevent accidental multiple clicks.


介绍

本插件自动为选中的 Figma 画板编号，支持添加前缀和后缀的自定义命名顺序。支持多种语言，提升您的工作效率和画板管理。


功能说明

  1. 自动为选中的 Figma 画板编号。
  2. 支持添加前缀和后缀的自定义命名。
  3. 支持多种语言。
  4. 两种命名顺序：从左到右再从上到下，或从上到下再从左到右。


使用方法

  1. 选择需要重新命名的画板。
  2. 选择您喜欢的命名顺序。
  3. 可选地添加前缀或后缀。
  4. 点击“应用命名”重新命名选中的画板。


注意事项

  1. 请确保在应用命名操作前已选中画板。
  2. 插件会在2秒内暂时禁用应用按钮，以防止意外的多次点击。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Automate artboard numbering with custom prefixes, suffixes, and multi-language support in Figma.

plugins.name: Bulk Text Replacer
plugins.description:
CSV形式のファイルを読み込んで一括置換できます。

1列目に検索対象、2列目に置換内容を記述したCSVファイルを読み込ませて使用して下さい。


手入力で「検索する言葉」と「置換する言葉」の間に「=>」を入れることでも可能です。

例：検索する言葉 => 置換する言葉


You can perform bulk text replacement by importing a CSV file.

The first column should contain the text to search for, and the second column should contain the replacement text.


Alternatively, you can manually enter replacement pairs using the => format.

Example: original text => replacement text
plugins.tagline: Bulk text replacement for Figma, Figjam & Slides.

plugins.name: Component State Mapper
plugins.description:
Tired of getting lost in complex component variants? Struggling to track every possible state, prevent design inconsistencies, and explain component logic to your team?


Introducing State Mapper, the essential Figma plugin that transforms your complex component sets into clear, interactive, and easy-to-understand visual maps. Stop navigating your variants blindfolded and gain a bird's-eye view of your entire component architecture.


With a single click, State Mapper instantly generates a live flowchart of all your variants, showing you exactly how they connect and what properties change between them.


Key Features:


  2. 🗺️ Instant Visual Mapping: Automatically generate beautiful, easy-to-read diagrams from any component set. See the full picture, from simple buttons to complex data tables.
  3. 🔬 Powerful Filtering & Layouts: Is your map too complex? No problem. Isolate exactly what you need by filtering properties and values. Switch between Hierarchical, Graph, and Matrix layouts to find the perfect view.
  4. ⚠️ Smart "Missing State" Detection: Our most powerful feature! State Mapper intelligently analyzes your component's properties and automatically flags potential "holes" or missing variants in your system, helping you prevent bugs before they happen.
  5. 🤝 Seamless Handoff & Documentation: Export your component maps as SVG or PNG to include them directly in your documentation on Confluence, Notion, or Jira. Make sure developers understand the logic perfectly.
  6. 🔄 Live Sync: Keep your map updated in real-time. As you add, remove, or change variants, your map reflects those changes instantly.

Who is it for?


State Mapper is built for meticulous Product Designers, UI/UX Designers, and Design System teams who want to build more robust, error-free, and well-documented components.


Install State Mapper today and bring order, clarity, and intelligence to your design system!
plugins.tagline: Bring clarity to component chaos.

plugins.name: UX Buddy
plugins.description:
Transform your design process with instant, expert-level UX feedback.


UX Buddy is your personal design critic that never sleeps. This powerful Figma plugin analyzes your frames and provides instant, actionable feedback based on proven UX principles and industry best practices.


What UX Buddy Does:

✨ **Instant UX Analysis** - Get comprehensive design feedback in seconds, not hours

🎯 **Actionable Insights** - Receive specific, implementable recommendations to improve your designs

🎨 **Visual Design Review** - Analyze color usage, typography, spacing, and visual hierarchy

📱 **Accessibility Checks** - Ensure your designs meet accessibility standards and guidelines

🚀 **Workflow Integration** - Seamlessly integrates into your existing Figma workflow


Key Features:

- **Smart Color Analysis** - Detect contrast issues and color harmony problems

- **Typography Review** - Identify font pairing, hierarchy, and readability issues

- **Layout Evaluation** - Analyze spacing, alignment, and visual balance

- **UX Best Practices** - Get feedback based on established design principles

- **Detailed Reports** - Receive comprehensive analysis with prioritized recommendations

- **Real-time Feedback** - Instant analysis as you design


Perfect For:

- **Product Designers** looking to validate their design decisions

- **UX/UI Designers** wanting to ensure best practices

- **Design Teams** seeking consistent quality standards

- **Freelancers** who need expert-level feedback

- **Students** learning design principles


How It Works:

1. Select any frame in your Figma file

2. Click the UX Buddy plugin

3. Get instant, expert-level analysis

4. Implement suggested improvements

5. Create better user experiences


**Professional-grade analysis** - Providing comprehensive design critique and UX insights based on industry standards and proven methodologies.


Stop guessing about your design decisions. Let UX Buddy guide you toward creating exceptional user experiences that delight and convert.

accepted.name: Opeyemi Ajagbe
accepted.description: I craft digital products that empower people and drive business growth.

plugins.tagline: Expert UX analysis that makes your designs better, instantly.

137629.name: UX Buddy
137629.description:
Transform your design process with instant, expert-level UX feedback.


UX Buddy is your personal design critic that never sleeps. This powerful Figma plugin analyzes your frames and provides instant, actionable feedback based on proven UX principles and industry best practices.


What UX Buddy Does:

✨ **Instant UX Analysis** - Get comprehensive design feedback in seconds, not hours

🎯 **Actionable Insights** - Receive specific, implementable recommendations to improve your designs

🎨 **Visual Design Review** - Analyze color usage, typography, spacing, and visual hierarchy

📱 **Accessibility Checks** - Ensure your designs meet accessibility standards and guidelines

🚀 **Workflow Integration** - Seamlessly integrates into your existing Figma workflow


Key Features:

- **Smart Color Analysis** - Detect contrast issues and color harmony problems

- **Typography Review** - Identify font pairing, hierarchy, and readability issues

- **Layout Evaluation** - Analyze spacing, alignment, and visual balance

- **UX Best Practices** - Get feedback based on established design principles

- **Detailed Reports** - Receive comprehensive analysis with prioritized recommendations

- **Real-time Feedback** - Instant analysis as you design


Perfect For:

- **Product Designers** looking to validate their design decisions

- **UX/UI Designers** wanting to ensure best practices

- **Design Teams** seeking consistent quality standards

- **Freelancers** who need expert-level feedback

- **Students** learning design principles


How It Works:

1. Select any frame in your Figma file

2. Click the UX Buddy plugin

3. Get instant, expert-level analysis

4. Implement suggested improvements

5. Create better user experiences


**Professional-grade analysis** - Providing comprehensive design critique and UX insights based on industry standards and proven methodologies.


Stop guessing about your design decisions. Let UX Buddy guide you toward creating exceptional user experiences that delight and convert.
137629.release_notes:
### **Major Update: Context-Aware Progressive Analysis System**

We've completely revolutionized the UX Buddy experience by solving the "moving goalpost" problem that frustrated users. Version 2.0 introduces intelligent analysis that remembers your progress and builds upon your improvements.

---

### ✨ **What's New in Version 2.0**

🧠 **Smart Progress Recognition**
- **Analysis Memory**: UX Buddy now remembers all your previous analyses and improvements
- **Progress Acknowledgment**: Get explicit recognition when you implement recommendations
- **Context-Aware Feedback**: Each new analysis builds upon what you've already fixed
- **No More Repeated Suggestions**: Fixed issues are never suggested again

📈 **Intelligent Score Progression**
- **Realistic Score Evolution**: Scores now properly reflect actual improvements made
- **Progress Validation**: Built-in checks prevent contradictory recommendations
- **Score History Tracking**: See how your design quality improves over time
- **Polish Mode**: Special high-quality design analysis for scores 7.0+

💎 **Enhanced Analysis Quality**
- **Semantic Issue Matching**: Advanced AI determines if issues are truly fixed or similar
- **Conflict Detection**: Prevents suggestions that would undo previous improvements
- **Progressive Recommendations**: New suggestions only when genuinely critical
- **Quality Validation**: Automatic checks ensure every analysis meets high standards
137629.tagline: Expert UX analysis that makes your designs better, instantly.

Simple, clean, and efficient — made for everyday design workflows.

137104.description:

plugins.name: Layer Query
plugins.description:
A powerful layer selection plugin that lets you find and select layers based on their design properties and custom component properties. Perfect for managing large design files and design systems efficiently.


## Key Features


- Multi-property search with combination filters

- Custom component property support (boolean, text, variant, instance swap)

- Flexible search scope: Entire file, Current page, Root frame, or Selected frames

- Search results with page grouping and navigation

- Real-time search progress with cancellation support

- Cross-page layer selection and navigation


## Supported Properties


**Typography:** Font size, font family, line height, text alignment, text content

**Fill:** Fill color, opacity

**Size:** Width, height

**Padding:** All directions (top, bottom, left, right, vertical, horizontal)

**Auto Layout:** Direction, sizing, alignment, item spacing

**Stroke:** Stroke color, stroke width

**Corner Radius:** All corners and individual corner values

**Layer:** Layer name, structure, type, opacity

**Position:** X and Y coordinates

**Custom:** Component instance properties


## Perfect For


- Design system maintenance and auditing

- Finding layers with specific styling across large files

- Quality assurance and design consistency checks

- Efficient layer organization and cleanup

- Component property management


Save hours of manual searching with precise property-based queries. Transform your Figma workflow from manual hunting to smart selection.


## Beta Version


This plugin is currently in beta. Please report any issues or feedback to help improve the experience.
plugins.tagline: Query and select layers by properties including custom components. Advanced search for efficiency.

136537.name: Layer Query
136537.description:

## Perfect For

- Quality assurance and design consistency checks

Save hours of manual searching with precise property-based queries. Transform your Figma workflow from manual hunting to smart selection.

This plugin is currently in beta. Please report any issues or feedback to help improve the experience.
136537.tagline: Query and select layers by properties including custom components. Advanced search for efficiency.

plugins.name: Size Snap
plugins.description: Size Snap instantly aligns your designs to a consistent grid by rounding the width and height of any selected layers—and their children—to a chosen multiple. Whether you pick one of the built-in presets (8, 16, 24, etc.) or enter your own custom value, Size Snap ensures every element snaps to clean, pixel-perfect dimensions.
plugins.tagline: Resize any component and its children to fit a given grid

136532.name: Size Snap
136532.description: Size Snap instantly aligns your designs to a consistent grid by rounding the width and height of any selected layers—and their children—to a chosen multiple. Whether you pick one of the built-in presets (8, 16, 24, etc.) or enter your own custom value, Size Snap ensures every element snaps to clean, pixel-perfect dimensions.
136532.tagline: Resize any component and its children to fit a given grid

plugins.name: Frame Select Helper
plugins.description:
Supports repeatedly selecting the same group of frames by adding a mark (frame name suffix) to the selected frames.


If you copy and paste the selected frames from this tool onto another page, you can export only the targeted frames to a single PDF file by clicking “File” -> “Export frames to PDF”!


選択したフレームにマーク（フレーム名の接尾辞）を付けて、繰り返し同じフレーム群を選択することをサポートします。

このツールで選択したフレームを、コピーして別ページにペーストすると、「ファイル」→「フレームをPDFにエクスポート」で狙ったフレームだけ単一PDFに書き出せます。


使い方

初回：選択対象にしたいフレームをマークする


Figmaのフレーム名に`--sfh-target`を付与する

これは手動で、またはフレームを選択した状態でプラグインを起動して"選択フレームを対象にマーク"を押すことで行う


2回目以降：フレームを一括選択する

  1. プラグインを起動する
  2. "すべて選択・解除"を押すと、マークしたフレームがすべて選択される


このツールで選択したフレームを、コピーして別ページにペーストすると、「ファイル」→「フレームをPDFにエクスポート」で狙ったフレームだけ単一PDFに書き出せます
plugins.tagline: Selection helper for those who want to repeatedly select the same frame for PDF export, etc.

このツールで選択したフレームを、コピーして別ページにペーストすると、「ファイル」→「フレームをPDFにエクスポート」で狙ったフレームだけ単一PDFに書き出せます
137113.release_notes: Fixed incorrect click area on checklist items by adding missing labels.
137113.tagline: Selection helper for those who want to repeatedly select the same frame for PDF export, etc.

plugins.name: Tiny Exports
plugins.description:
Optimize your exported assets for web and mobile applications with just a few clicks.


Features

  1. Export layers with Figma’s export settings
  2. Support for layer naming conventions. Useful for setting exports in component libraries.
  3. Export individual layers or all at once
  4. Export only exportable layers under the current selection
  5. Support for TinyPNG compression (API key required) – available for free
  6. WIP: Apply export settings automatically to all image layers
  7. WIP: Apply export settings to all manually selected layers


How to Use

  1. Set Figma’s export settings or use the naming convention `export-[scale]x-[format]` (e.g., `export-1.5x-png`).
  2. Trigger the plugin in Figma while in design mode.
  3. Get a TinyPNG API key from [tinypng.com/developers](https://tinypng.com/developers) and enter it in the plugin’s Settings tab.
  4. Enable TinyPNG compression for optimized images.
  5. Use the plugin UI to export individual layers or all at once.


Naming Convention

SVGs or PDFs do not support `scale`. If a naming convention is present, it is preferred over Figma's export settings. It is recommended to use Figma's export settings if you can.

  1. Format: `export-[scale]x-[format]`
  2. `scale`: Any number (e.g., 2, 1.5) – 1 by default
  3. `format`: png, jpg, svg, or pdf – jpg is set by default


Examples:

  1. `imageName [export-1.5x-png]`
  2. `imageName [export-2x-jpg]`
  3. `imageName [export-jpg]`
  4. `svgName [export-svg]`


Security

  1. The TinyPNG API key is stored only locally
  2. The plugin uses a proxy to communicate with the API


Known Issues

- Unable to export and set multiple exports from one layer
plugins.tagline: Easily export all layers with TinyPNG compression.

plugins.name: Content Fillr
plugins.description:
ContentFillr streamlines your design workflow by instantly filling frames and text nodes with realistic avatars and meaningful content. No more manual placeholder updates, quickly bring your designs to life with one click!


Key Features:

  1. ⚡️ Auto-fill selected frames with unique, realistic avatar images.
  2. ✏️ Instantly generate AI-powered text content tailored to your needs.
  3. 🎯 Easy-to-use filters for avatars by gender.
  4. 🌐 Free avatar library sourced from Unsplash for hassle-free use.


Save time, boost productivity, and focus on the creative work you love.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Populate Designs with Smart Content & Avatars 🚀

plugins.name: Update Human Design Panel
plugins.description:
This plugin is part of a structured system for generating personalized Human Design maps in Figma.

It retrieves JSON data from an external endpoint and populates predefined fields in a frame named INPUT_PANEL.

To function properly, the file must include that frame and the relevant text layers.

This plugin is intended for use within a specific workflow, but may be adapted for similar use cases.
plugins.tagline: Automatically fill a data panel in your Figma file from a remote JSON source.

137360.name: Update Human Design Panel
137360.description:
This plugin is part of a structured system for generating personalized Human Design maps in Figma.

It retrieves JSON data from an external endpoint and populates predefined fields in a frame named INPUT_PANEL.

To function properly, the file must include that frame and the relevant text layers.

This plugin is intended for use within a specific workflow, but may be adapted for similar use cases.
137360.release_notes:
PANEL UPDATER – Version 1.1
Release Notes

Improved security: now uses dynamic token authentication from the Figma panel to validate all server communications.

Enhanced error handling and status reporting to external services.

Minor adjustments for stability and performance.
137360.tagline: Automatically fill a data panel in your Figma file from a remote JSON source.

plugins.name: KColor.co
plugins.description:
KColor.co – The Free Smartest Color Tool for Designers

Create or get inspired with beautiful, accessible color palettes – all inside Figma. KColor.co brings essential tools into one sleek plugin:


Palette Generator: Instantly generate harmonious color sets in multiple modes (shades, tints, gradients, monochrome or Tailwind).


Contrast Checker: Test color combinations against WCAG 3 (APCA) standards to ensure readability and accessibility.


Color Blindness Simulator: See how your designs appear to users with different types of color blindness.


Export palettes to styles, variables or other formats.


Whether you are whipping up a fresh design or polishing the final pixels, KColor.co helps you work faster, smarter, and with accessibility baked in.
plugins.tagline: The Free Smartest Color Tool for Designers

135634.tagline: Toolkit for the Designers at Street!

plugins.name: Elemental
plugins.description:
Elemental lets you export images and copy color and shadow values in a single click—no need to set a layer to export, or break a color style to see the hex value. Elemental is built for those quick one-off moments when a developer needs an asset or another app is asking for your primary brand color.


What it does:

  1. Export one or more layers as images in your desired file type and size
  2. Copy the fill color of a layer to clipboard in your desired value type
  3. Copy the stroke color of a layer to clipboard in your desired value type
  4. Copy a layer's shadows in css format


How it works:

  1. Keep your Elemental panel handy
  2. Select a layer
  3. Click your desired export or copy button
plugins.tagline: Snag basic assets in a flash
